template.description:
Stream files to 'RawData' Kafka topic
Let spark streaming application consume 'RawData' Kafka topic, transform and publish new data to 'TransformedData' Kafka topic
Finally, ConsumeKafkaRecord consumes the 'TransformedData' topic and sends it to Big Query for analysis
template.name: Complete flow

labels.label: Stream files to the 'RawData' Kafka topic
Consume the 'TransformedData' topic and send it to BigQuery
